QuestData.Title: Find the Lost Guards
QuestData.Description: A few days ago we sent two Guards, Rolf and Malakai, to investigate along the river, and they have not yet returned. To complete my report, I must know what happened to those men.$B$BTravel north along the river and find the guards... or their remains.
QuestData.LogDescription: Guard Thomas wants you to travel north up the river and search for the two lost guards, Rolf and Malakai.
QuestData.RewardText: Although much has been stripped from the corpse, strewn nearby is a medallion with the words: "Footman Malakai Stone" etched upon it.
